actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act of 1947 to provide a property tax credit to certain senior citizens, and for other purposes;.

summary.text: Provides, under the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Act, a property tax credit to specified senior citizens. Establishes formulae and requirements for determining such credits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act of 1947 to provide a property tax credit to certain senior citizens, and for other purposes;.
